responses.rationale: 'grown to include eight people' reports a numerical metric (number of infections) using a standard descriptive verb.
'risen rapidly' reports a numerical metric (number of herds) using a standard verb ('risen') and a neutral adverb ('rapidly').
'lasted for 20 to 30 seconds' reports a numerical metric (duration) using a standard descriptive verb.
'has risen rapidly' reports a numerical metric (number of herds) using a standard verb ('risen') and a neutral adverb ('rapidly').
The segment discusses risk levels qualitatively ('at most risk', 'negligible') rather than reporting numerical metrics.
The segment describes a personal feeling and uses strong language ('devastating pandemic') but does not report numerical metrics.
